List of Users

  • {{ user.firstName }} {{ user.lastName }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user', templateUrl: './users.component.html', // Updated the template URL }) export class UserComponent implements OnInit { users: Users[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.http.get('http://localhost:5157/api/users').subscribe((data) => { this.users = data; }); } }
